title: Horizon Real Estate
description: Enterprise real estate management platform with comprehensive property and contract management.
fullDescription: A sophisticated real estate management platform developed as the final project for Assembly School, showcasing enterprise-level full-stack development capabilities. The system features a robust backend built with C# and .NET 7, implementing Clean Architecture with Domain-Driven Design principles. The frontend delivers a modern user experience using Angular 16 with reactive forms, state management, and responsive Tailwind CSS design. Key architectural achievements include repository pattern implementation, CQRS with MediatR, and comprehensive unit testing. The platform handles complex business workflows including property listings, tenant management, lease contracts, and financial tracking with role-based access control for administrators, agents, and clients.
features: CQRS Pattern with MediatR for command/query separation
Advanced property search with filters and pagination
Lease contract management with PDF generation
technicalHighlights: Backend: .NET 7 Web API with Entity Framework Core
Database: SQL Server with migrations and seeding
Frontend: Angular 16 with RxJS for state management
Authentication: JWT with refresh token mechanism
Architecture: Clean Architecture with separation of concerns
Testing: 85%+ code coverage with xUnit and Moq
UI/UX: Modern design system with Tailwind CSS
achievements: Implemented complex business logic for real estate workflows
Achieved 85%+ test coverage across backend services
Designed scalable architecture supporting 1000+ concurrent users
Reduced API response time by 40% through query optimization

title: Dolci Cerqueira
description: Interactive recipe sharing platform with social features and advanced filtering.
fullDescription: A comprehensive recipe sharing platform celebrating Brazilian cuisine, built with ASP.NET MVC following industry best practices. The application features a clean, responsive interface powered by Tailwind CSS and enhanced with JavaScript for dynamic user interactions. The backend implements proper MVC architecture with separation of concerns, repository pattern, and efficient data access using Entity Framework. Social features include user profiles, recipe favorites system, rating and review functionality, and a sophisticated filtering system that allows users to search by ingredients, dietary restrictions, cooking time, and difficulty level. The platform demonstrates strong understanding of web development fundamentals while delivering an engaging user experience.
features: Recipe creation and editing with rich text formatting
Advanced filtering by dietary preferences (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free)
Rating and review system for recipes
Responsive design optimized for all devices
Image upload and management for recipes
Social features: follow users and share recipes
technicalHighlights: Architecture: ASP.NET MVC with proper separation of concerns
Data Access: Entity Framework with repository pattern
Frontend: Modern CSS with Tailwind and vanilla JavaScript
Security: Input validation and XSS protection
Performance: Optimized database queries with LINQ
UI/UX: Intuitive navigation and responsive layouts
achievements: Implemented complex search and filter functionality
Created intuitive user interface for recipe management
Optimized database performance for recipe queries
